send_to_mobile_description: A mobile country code is needed to send when sending to a mobile number
what_is_a_memo_desciption:
If you’re sending funds to a Stellar Address, it is important to include a MEMO if the recipient requires a MEMO. The MEMO acts as an important reference for the receiving party to detect any incoming payments and or deposits for crediting your balance. 

 If you do not include a MEMO when it is required by the recipient, you can lose your funds.
what_is_a_federation_address_description:
Stellar makes it easy for third party wallet providers to embed the MEMO in a human readable address format, similar to that of an email address. The only difference is that the @ symbol is replaced with a * symbol, e.g.

username*domain.com

It is important to make sure that you are sending funds to a valid federated address.
how_do_on_chain_transactions_work: How do on chain transactions work?
how_do_on_chain_transactions_work_descri:
If you’re sending funds to a Stellar Address it means that the transaction will be broadcasted to the Stellar Network.

There is usually a small network fee in XLM that will either be passed on to you as the user, or be absorbed by the organization.

You’ll be notified if the fee will be applied to your XLM account or not.

You’ll also be able to copy and/or click on the transaction hash to view the transaction chain details after it is broadcasted to the network.

It is important to note that on chain transactions can’t be reversed.
this_may_take_a_while_to_load: This may take a while to load...
wyre_helper_text:
You will be redirected to **Wyre** to complete your purchase securely.

Please do not refresh the page or click the “Back” button of your browser.

You will need to go through a KYC.
**Please prepare your card details, billing address, email andphone number**

stellar_receive_help_modal_text: When sending funds to your address, you **must** include the memo in your transaction. A memo is how we associate your funds with your Stellar wallet. **If you do not include the memo when depositing funds to this address, your balance will not be credited.**
non_stellar_receive_help_modal_text: Make sure to send your **{{code}}** to the address details provided. **Failing to use the correct address will result in loss of funds.**
set_stellar_username_description: Please set a username. This will be used to create your federation address; a personalized, easy-to-remember address representing your Stellar receive address and memo.

documents_pending_description: Your documents are pending verification. You can view the status of your documents in Profile > Documents or tap the button below.
documents_failed_description: A document required to link your bank account has been rejected. Please re-upload your verification document to complete your KYC
